<<<<<<< HEAD
The notable hystorie of two famous princes of the worlde, Astianax and Polixena wherein is set forth the cursed treason of Caulcas. Very pleasaunt & delectable to reade. Gathered in English verse by Iohn Partridge, in the yeare. 1566 Partridge, John, fl. 1566-1573.
[24] p.
By Henry Denham, for Thomas Hacket: and are to be solde at hys shop in Lumbard streate, Imprinted at London : [1566]
Signatures: A B⁴. Publication date from STC. In verse. Running title reads: The hystorie of Astianax & Polixena. Signature B1-end torn; some pages stained. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[24] p.
By Henry Denham, for Thomas Hacket: and are to be solde at hys shop in Lumbard streate, Imprinted at London : [1566]
